headers.subject: Struts and ServletExec (Day 2)
headers.received: from sunny.pacific.net.sg (203.120.90.127) by locus.apache.org with SMTP; 27 Jun 2000 07:07:05 -0000

body.para: Managed to deploy the struts-example.war. Here are my notes:

1) You need to unjar the WAR to a directory. ServletExec has a (unofficial) bug that prevents deployment with WAR 2) Add struts.jar to the classpath. 3) Also need to add JAXP to the classpath (jaxp.jar and parser.jar)
Now ServletExec should starts up without problem. One major problem reminds:
When I clicked on the register link, I've got a 404 "The requested URL /struts/editRegistration.do was not found on this server.".
When I try the second link, the login form comes up but when I clicked the submit button, I've obtain another 404 "The requested URL /struts/logon.do was not found on this server.".
